title: Cannot update camera app
content:
Hi,

On my pixel 4 xl running android 11, the play store has camera app version 7.5 from August 2020. However I think that there is a new version 7.6 since October. I erased the cache of play store and camera, but still play store shows the August version on my pixel.

How can I install the new version?
(I tried to install version 7.6 from apk but the installation failed.)

Thank you.
